post.author: oliver
post.title: ASP.NET MVC Quick Reference
post.content:
1. _ViewStart.cshtml: applies hierarchically to all views in the same folder and all subfolders, can be nested; for more info see http://jittuu.com/2011/10/28/ViewStart-in-MVC-3/
  2. RenderBody, RenderPage, RenderSection:  http://www.dotnetcurry.com/ShowArticle.aspx?ID=636
  3. C# Razor Syntax Quick Reference

Happy MVCing!
